Title: Relates to prohibiting insurance companies from discriminating based on genetic predisposition; repealer
Summary: Prohibits insurance companies from discriminating based on genetic predisposition including refusing to issue or renew, charging any increased rate, or restricting any length of coverage; prohibits insurers from requiring genetic testing.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง2615, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting insurance companies from discriminating based on genetic predisposition; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
